V03vinv05_u:1063: sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavati argalakaṃ datvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1066: yat khalv āyuṣman śroṇa jānīthāḥ śāstrā te ekapalāśikopānahā anujñātā na dvipuṭīti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1070: saced ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi syān me atonidānaṃ sabrahmacāriṇo vaktāraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1071: prabhūtaṃ tatra śroṇakoṭīviṃśena pravrajyāvāptaṃ yaś campām asādhāraṇāṃ saptahastikāṃ cānīkam apahāya pravrajitaḥ sa idānīm upānahakalpamātre saktaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1074: etat prakaraṇam āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vistareṇārocayati /
V03vinv05_u:1076: tasmād anujānāmi śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam āgamya sarvasaṃghenaikapalāśikopānahā dhārayitavyā na dvipuṭīti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1077: anyatamo mahallo bhagavataḥ purastāt sopānatkaś caṃkramati /
V03vinv05_u:1078: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣum idam avocat* /
V03vinv05_u:1079: apehi bhikṣo mā me puratas tiṣṭha /
V03vinv05_u:1081: yas tāvad asau bhikṣavaḥ śāstā sarvalokāmiṣasaṃmṛṣṭo bhavati tasya tāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakā naiva laghu laghv eva pātakavratam āpadyante /
V03vinv05_u:1084: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ upānahau dhārayanti tasmān na bhikṣuṇā upānahā dhārayitavyā iti /
V03vinv05_u:1098: na paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣuṃ vinā vāditreṇa nṛtyantam* /
V03vinv05_u:1100: jānakā pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti /
V03vinv05_u:1101: pṛcchati buddho bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣuṃ kim abhiprāyeṇa bhikṣo evaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv05_u:1107: sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavaty argalakaṃ datvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1121: tena khalu samayena dvayor ekapalāśikā upānahāḥ kriyante bhikṣūṇām uparatakānāṃ ca /
V03vinv05_u:1122: sa bhikṣur bhūyo bhūyaś carmakārasakāśam upasaṃkrāmati /
V03vinv05_u:1124: apareṇa samayena bhūyas tena gṛhapatinā sa bhikṣur dṛṣṭo 'nupānatkaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1126: ārya na tena śilpinā upānahā dattā /
V03vinv05_u:1127: gṛhapate na śrutaṃ tvayā durlabhaḥ śilpī satyajalpaka iti /
V03vinv05_u:1131: sa tena gṛhaṃ nītvā praṇītenāhāreṇa santarpya bahupuṭī upānahā dattā /
V03vinv05_u:1137: sa tām ādāya śastrakaṃ ca vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā utpāṭayitum ārabdhaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1138: (MSV IV 206) bhagavāṃś ca taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1141: mama ca bahupuṭī eva saṃpannā ekapuṭīṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyāmi /
V03vinv05_u:1143: dāsyanti batāmī śrāddhā gṛhapatayaḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ bahupuṭī upānahā tasmād anujānāmi bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktena kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1145: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bahupuṭī upānahā āgārikavinirmuktebhiḥ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
V03vinv05_u:1147: antata upālin sapta vāṣṭa vā padāni parimuktāni bhavanti /
V03vinv05_u:1149: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ evaṃrūpā upānahāḥ kriyante /
V03vinv05_u:1150: tadyathā hinihināyamānāḥ kiṇikiṇāyamānā meṇḍaviṣāṇikā bodhipaṭapatrakāḥ citropacitrāḥ paṃcakārṣāpaṇamūlyāḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1151: ṣaḍvargikair hi dṛṣṭo bhavati upānahā yāvat pidhāya te pārṣṇipādāṅguṣṭhena pāṭayitvā grīvāyāṃ mellayitvā gṛhṇantīdaṃ te dānaṃ cittālaṅkārāya /
V03vinv05_u:1159: tena dṛṣṭaḥ sa ekasmin gṛhe praviṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1161: sa tasmād gṛhān nirgatyāparaṃ gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1164: ārya kasyārthe tvaṃ māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1166: bhadramukha nāhaṃ tavopānahām apaharāmi tv ahaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi /
V03vinv05_u:1168: ārya hara vā mā vāpi tu yuṣmākaṃ sāmantakena śabdo visṛtaḥ - āryakā upanāhā harantīti /
V03vinv05_u:1171: yaḥ kaścid ādīnava iha bhikṣava evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayanti hinihinikā iti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1172: (91r = GBM 6.764) tasmān na bhikṣuṇā evaṃrūpā upānahā dhārayitavyā hinihinikā iti vistaraḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1173: bhikṣur imām evaṃrūpām upānahāṃ dhārayati sātisāro bhavati /
V03vinv05_u:1175: tena khalu samayena bhikṣūṇām upānahābhiḥ pādapṛṣṭhe vraṇāni kṛtāni /
V03vinv05_u:1185: parvatam abhiruhatāṃ pādāṅguṣṭheṣu kṣatāni (MSV IV 208) bhavanti /
V03vinv05_u:1198: ṛkṣacarmam anujñātam ārā śastrī ca baddhikā //
V03vinv05_u:1211: yadā virūḍhakena mohapuruṣeṇa kāpilavāstavaḥ śākyāḥ praghātitāḥ tatra kecid uttarāpathaṃ gatāḥ kecid yāvan naivālaṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
V03vinv05_u:1229: yad uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā haimavateṣu janapadeṣu pūlā dhārayitavyā iti /
V03vinv05_u:1239: kim eṣa ānanda bhikṣor lubdhakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ (MSV IV 210)
V03vinv05_u:1244: yadi śatasahasram api labhati sarvaṃ praghātayati /
V03vinv05_u:1253: yāvad asti mama kauśalaṃ yadi bhagavān anujānīyād granthayeyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1256: yasya kauśalaṃ vidyate tena pratigupte pradeśe sthitvā granthayitavyam* /
V03vinv05_u:1263: tasmād anujānāmi bhikṣuṇā ārā śastrakaṃ baddhikā ca dhārayitavyāḥ /
